reviewText: Picture quality...excellent. Top quality packaging. For English speaking viewers Dutch subtitles are removable. Yes...you need an all-region player for these Region 2 DVDs. BUT...there are a number of all-region players for under $50 available right here on Amazon. I think the Phillips I bought cost $30 and change. No...it's not the most deluxe player you might find. All it does is play the DVDs efficiently and without issues.
Good collection of rare, hard to find (or afford) Hammer films
Unavailable in Region 1 (USA). These are actually Dutch, no English subtitles. Sound track is English.

Some great old movies!  I had some issues with playing the DVDs due to a misunderstanding about which regional encoding was being used, but the seller made some helpful suggestions and the matter was resolved (I can watch them on my computer with no problems).
